title: Decky-Undervolt could not be made without this awesome tools:
ryzenadj: Power Management tool for Ryzen APUs made by FlyGoat (LGPL-3.0 license)
steamDeckUndervolt: Easy way to implement per-core undervolt, made by Pososaku (GPL-3.0 License)
supportTitle: But most importantly, Decky-Undervolt could not be made without the support of these amazing people:
pososaku: For making Steam Deck overclocking popular in Russian community and his awesome fork
deadwenk: For contributing Steam-Deck-Software-Undervolt and making it easier to use per-core undervolting
foxN: For finding a solution to make software undervolting possible at Steam Deck OLED
thankYou: And of course, thank you for using Decky-Undervolt!
